name: Water Cycle
description:
This game was designed in one week for the weekly game jam n°143. The theme was 'running water', so I decided to make an endless runner. The main mechanic is the change of state of the water between each zone of the game: ice, liquid water and gaseous state. I hope you'll have fun playing this game.

Controls :

Use space to jump

Use Z/S keys to move up and down as a cloud
